Scenes > The House of Sabu

– Click image to view.

The House of Sabu

(釣船三婦内) (Tsuribune Sabu uchi)

Performance: May 1976: The Summer Festival at Naniwa

Production: May 1976

Narrators:

Takemoto Oritayū V (see also Takemoto Tsunatayū IX) (竹本織大夫 (五))

Shamisen (Musicians):

Tsuruzawa Enza V (鶴澤燕三 (五))
